free_text.Learning outcomes: This course aims at giving the theoretical foundations of linear system theory with emphasis on mathematical description, properties and design aspects.
free_text.Content: The course contents include the following main chapters:[br/][br/][li]Mathematical description of linear systems[br/][li]State-space solutions and realizations[br/][li]Stability[br/][li]Controllability and observability[br/][li]Minimal realizations and coprime fractions[br/][li]State feedback and state estimation
free_text.Keywords: Linear dynamic models, Linear systems, Stability, State feedback, State estimation
free_text.Required prior knowledge: [li] Linear Algebra[br/][li] Differential Equations[br/][li] Automatic Control
